name: 恋鐘
text: どっか……
trans: Anywhere...

name: 恋鐘
text: どっか……──
trans: Like somewhere...

name: 男性１
text:
──さんとこも大変みたいよ？
どう、新しい子？
trans:
You seem to have been having a rough time.
How is the new kid?

name: 女性１
text:
──キャー、やだー！　お久しぶりー
見たわよあれ！　あの──
trans:
Oh my! It's been quite some time.
Look at that! Over there.

name: 恋鐘
text: どっか……ぐ～～んって──
trans: Somewhere... really amazing...

name: 男性２
text:
キミ、可愛いねぇ
あ、２８３の子？
trans:
My, you're a cutie.
Say, aren't you from 283?

name: 恋鐘
text:
──ふぇ……あっ……はいっ～！
２８３プロダクションの月岡恋鐘です～！
trans:
Fuwee...Oh... Yes!
I'm Tsukioka Kogane from 283 Production!

name: 恋鐘
text: ぐ～～んって……──
trans: Really...

name: 男性２
text: ──それじゃ社長さんにもよろしく！　こあめちゃん！
trans: Please tell your president my regards, Koame-chan!

name: 恋鐘
text: えっ、こあ……？　うちは、こが──
trans: Eh? Koame? Not, my name's Koga─

name: 恋鐘
text:
……どっか、ぐ～～～んって、
連れてってほしかよ、プロデューサー……！
trans:
Somewhere really amazing...
Please, Producer, take me somewhere!

name: プロデューサー
text:
──さ、乗ってくれ
…………どうした？　恋鐘……
trans:
Alright, get in.
Say, Kogane. Is something wrong?

name: 恋鐘
text:
……ん？　ううん～！
ちょっとぼーっとしとっただけ～
trans:
Huh? Oh, nothing.
I was just spacing out a bit.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……今日はあんまり居心地のいい会じゃなかったもんな
でもよく頑張ってたぞ、恋鐘
trans:
This was probably a somewhat awkward get-together.
Still, you were great, Kogane.

name: 恋鐘
text: ふぇ、ほんと～！？
trans: Really? You think so?

name: プロデューサー
text:
ああ。ずっと笑顔で、しっかり対応してたよ
途中……ひとりにしちゃって、ごめんな
trans:
Yes. You were carrying yourself well and was smiling throughout.
I'm really sorry to have left you all by yourself in the middle of things.

name: 恋鐘
text:
う、ううん～！！　そいが営業やもんね～
うちにまかせとって！
trans:
N-No, it's alright! That's talking to clients too, right.
You can count on me to handle those!

name: プロデューサー
text:
はは、頼もしい返事だ
急いで送るからさ、今日はゆっくり休んでく──
trans:
Haha. That's reassuring hearing from you.
I'll get you home right away, so you could just take it easy─

name: 恋鐘
text: ──あっ、プロデューサー……！
trans: Umm, Producer.

name: 恋鐘
text: そ、そいやったら、あの……──
trans: If you don't mind, well...

name: 恋鐘
text:
あの……うち…………
…………どっか、行きたか……
trans: How should I say this... I want to go somewhere else first...

name: プロデューサー
text:
え……？　……どっか、って……
──帰るんじゃなくって？
trans:
Huh? Somewhere else?
Like not straight home?

name: 恋鐘
text:
うん～……！　ど、どこでもよかけん、どっか──
ぐ～～～ん！　って行きたか……！
trans: Yes! I-It could be anywhere, like somewhere really amazing! I want to go to a place like that!

name: プロデューサー
text:
ぐ～ん………………
はははっ──
trans:
Really amazing, you say...
Hahaha.

name: プロデューサー
text:
そっか、やっぱり窮屈な思いを
させちゃってたんだな……
trans: I see. So, I did put you through in an uncomfortable situation...

name: 恋鐘
text: ……プロデューサー……？
trans: Producer?

name: プロデューサー
text: うん。俺には気の利いた場所は浮かばないけど──
trans: Hmm. I can't really think of a good place but...

name: プロデューサー
text:
ちょっと、深呼吸しに行こう
高速に乗るぞ
trans:
Okay, let's take a short breather.
We'll be taking the highway.

name: 恋鐘
trans: R-Really?

name: 恋鐘
text:
んふふ～！
ありがと～、プロデューサー！
trans:
Mfufu~!
Thank you, Producer!

name: 恋鐘
trans: Really amazing! Mfufu~!

name: 恋鐘
text:
──ねぇ、プロデューサー！
あれなんやろ、あのピカピカって光っとるお店～！
trans:
Say, Producer!
What's that twinkling store supposed to be?

name: プロデューサー
text: ん？　……ああ、パチンコ屋かな？
trans: Hmm? Oh, I guess, a pachinko parlor.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふぇ……パチンコ屋～～！？
──あっ、あっちのもすごかぁ！　なんやろ！？
trans:
Fuwee! A pachinko parlor, you say?
Ah, what about that one? It looks really amazing!

name: プロデューサー
text: あのレンガ風のやつか？　……ファミレスかなぁ
trans: That brick-style one? Maybe it's a family restaurant.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ええ～～～っ！
あがんすごかもん……ファミレスなわけなかよ～！
trans:
EH!?
There's no way that a family restaurant would have that kind of really amazing design!

name: プロデューサー
text:
いや、郊外のはでっかくて派手だぞ？
……あ、ほら──遠くだけど、観覧車が見える……
trans:
Not really, the one in suburbs are big and flashy, remember?
Oh, look over there. It's a little far from here but, you could see the ferris wheel.

name: 恋鐘
trans: Ooh! A ferris wheel!

name: 恋鐘
text: きれか…………
trans: It's so beautiful.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……うん
ごめんな、あそこまで行けたらいいんだけど……
trans:
Yes.
I'm really sorry about this. This would've been really better if we were able to go there.

name: 恋鐘
text:
う、ううん～！　そがん意味じゃなかよ……
……ここまで連れてきてもらって、うれしか
trans:
I-It's alright! That's not what I meant.
...I'm really happy that you took me here.

name: プロデューサー
text: 恋鐘……
trans: Kogane...

name: 恋鐘
text:
んふふ～！
なんか、夜の中ば飛んどるみたい……
trans:
Mfufu~!
It kinda feels like we're flying through the night.

name: 恋鐘
trans: So amazing!

name: プロデューサー
text: うん……
trans: Yeah.

name: 恋鐘
text: …………きれかぁ
trans: So beautiful.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ねぇ、プロデューサー
うちのこと、呼んで
trans:
Umm, Producer.
Could you try calling out to me?

name: プロデューサー
trans: Huh?

name: 恋鐘
text:
うちのこと、恋鐘って
さっき『こあめ』って、間違えられたとさね……
trans:
Call out my name, "Kogane".
Someone called me "Koame" by mistake earlier.

name: プロデューサー
text:
──そっか……
嫌な思い、させちゃったな
trans:
I see...
I didn't know that I let you go through such a bad experience...

name: プロデューサー
trans: "Kogane".

name: 恋鐘
text: ……んふふ～、なに～
trans: Mfufu What is it?

name: プロデューサー
text: なにって……恋鐘が呼べって言ったんだぞ
trans: What, you ask. But, you're the one who asked me to call out to you.

name: 恋鐘
text: えへへ～
trans: Ehehe

name: プロデューサー
text:
でも……
うん。恋鐘は、恋鐘だ
trans:
Still...
Yeah, you are you, Kogane.

name: 恋鐘
text:
うん～
ありがと、プロデューサー
trans:
Yes.
Thank you, Producer.

name: 恋鐘
text: ありがと～
trans: I really appreciate that.
